goal.ch: 此課程內容的目標將是讓學生習知分散式電腦網路系統的理論基礎、系統平台技術以及網連技術與應用，課程亦導讀所屬研究領域最新的期刊與會議論文，引領學生更清楚了解所屬領域的研究進展與趨勢。
goal.en: This course will teach the knowledge of distributed computer network systems, including fundamental, platforms, networking and applications. Also, this course will share the information about the update-to-date research progress by asking students to read selected papers in this research area.
